targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
    approx_distinct(c_ip) AS client_ip,
    approx_distinct(cs_referer) AS referrer,
    approx_distinct(cs_method) AS http_method,
    approx_distinct(regexp_extract(cs_uri_stem, '/live/([^/]+)/', 1)) AS channels,
    approx_distinct(regexp_extract(cs_uri_stem, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1)) AS long_token,
    approx_distinct(cs_uri_stem) AS request_url,
    approx_distinct(sc_status) AS http_status,
    approx_distinct(x_edge_result_type) AS cache_status,
    approx_distinct(cs_user_agent) AS user_agent,
    approx_distinct(sc_content_type) AS content_type,
    approx_distinct(x_edge_location) AS edge_location
FROM "cdn_logs_cloudfront_partitioned"."access_logs_parquet"
WHERE 
    year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')
    AND month >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%m') AND month <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%m')
    AND day >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%d') AND day <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%d')
    AND date_parse(concat(date, ' ', time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= $__timeFrom()
    AND date_parse(concat(date, ' ', time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= $__timeTo()
    AND (
      COALESCE('${client_ip}', '') = '' OR POSITION(',' || CAST(c_ip AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${client_ip}' || ',') > 0
    )
    AND (
      COALESCE('${http_method}', '') = '' OR POSITION(',' || CAST(cs_method AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${http_method}' || ',') > 0
    )
    AND (
      COALESCE('${request_url}', '') = '' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE CONCAT('%', '${request_url}', '%')
    )
    AND (
  COALESCE('${request_qs}', '') = ''
  OR cs_uri_query LIKE CONCAT('%', '${request_qs}', '%')
)
    AND (
      COALESCE('${http_status}', '') = '' OR ',' || '${http_status}' || ',' LIKE '%,' || CAST(sc_status AS VARCHAR) || ',%'
    )
    AND (
      COALESCE('${cache_status}', '') = '' OR POSITION(',' || CAST(x_edge_result_type AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${cache_status}' || ',') > 0
    )
    AND (
      COALESCE('${user_agent}', '') = '' OR POSITION(',' || CAST(cs_user_agent AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${user_agent}' || ',') > 0
    )
    AND (
      COALESCE('${referrer}', '') = '' OR POSITION(',' || CAST(cs_referer AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${referrer}' || ',') > 0
    )
    AND (
  COALESCE('${response_time}', '') = ''
  OR CAST(time_taken AS DOUBLE) >= CAST('${response_time}' AS DOUBLE)
)
LIMIT 10000;

SELECT
  date,
  time,
  x_edge_location,
  sc_bytes,
  c_ip,
  cs_method,
  cs_host,
  cs_uri_stem,
  sc_status,
  cs_referer,
  cs_user_agent,
  cs_uri_query,
  cs_cookie,
  x_edge_result_type,
  x_edge_request_id,
  x_host_header,
  cs_protocol,
  cs_bytes,
  time_taken,
  x_forwarded_for,
  ssl_protocol,
  ssl_cipher,
  x_edge_response_result_type,
  cs_protocol_version,
  fle_status,
  fle_encrypted_fields,
  c_port,
  time_to_first_byte,
  x_edge_detailed_result_type,
  sc_content_type,
  sc_content_len,
  sc_range_start,
  sc_range_end,
  regexp_extract(cs_uri_stem, '/live/([^/]+)/', 1) AS channels,
  regexp_extract(cs_uri_stem, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1) AS long_token,
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_parse(concat(date, ' ', time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_parse(concat(date, ' ', time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_parse(concat(date, ' ', time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))
    ELSE date_trunc('hour', date_parse(concat(date, ' ', time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))
  END as time_bucket
FROM "cdn_logs_cloudfront_partitioned"."access_logs_parquet"
WHERE 
  year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')
  AND month >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%m') AND month <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%m')
  AND day >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%d') AND day <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%d')
  AND date_parse(concat(date, ' ', time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_parse(concat(date, ' ', time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= $__timeTo()
AND (
  COALESCE('${client_ip}', '') = ''
  OR POSITION(',' || CAST(c_ip AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${client_ip}' || ',') > 0
)
AND (
  COALESCE('${http_method}', '') = ''
  OR POSITION(',' || CAST(cs_method AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${http_method}' || ',') > 0
)
AND (
  COALESCE('${request_url}', '') = ''
  OR cs_uri_stem LIKE CONCAT('%', '${request_url}', '%')
)
AND (
  COALESCE('${request_qs}', '') = ''
  OR cs_uri_query LIKE CONCAT('%', '${request_qs}', '%')
)
AND (
  COALESCE('${http_status}', '') = ''
  OR 
    ',' || '${http_status}' || ',' LIKE '%,' || CAST(sc_status AS VARCHAR) || ',%'
)
AND (
  COALESCE('${cache_status}', '') = ''
  OR POSITION(',' || CAST(x_edge_result_type AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${cache_status}' || ',') > 0
)
AND (
  COALESCE('${user_agent}', '') = ''
  OR POSITION(',' || CAST(cs_user_agent AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${user_agent}' || ',') > 0
)
AND (
  COALESCE('${referrer}', '') = ''
  OR POSITION(',' || CAST(cs_referer AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${referrer}' || ',') > 0
)
AND (
  COALESCE('${response_time}', '') = ''
  OR CAST(time_taken AS DOUBLE) >= CAST('${response_time}' AS DOUBLE)
)

LIMIT 1000

title: CloudFront CDN Logs - Raw Table - Athena Table
